page.title: 10VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: I live in Thorne Coffin which is a medium sized village just outside the town of Yeovil.I go to Westfield Comprehensive which is in Yeovil.Thorne Coffin is mainly made up of farmhouses and cottages.The biggest house in the village is Thorne House which is Westland's guest house.There are three derilict houses next to Thorne cottage.These are owned by Mrs Elizabeth Gillett.Mrs Gillett is one of the main landowners in Thorne.There is one church_St.Andrews.There are no pubs,shops or post offices in Thorne.There is a village hall in Thorne but it is not used very often as it is slightly run_down.
